Reference

I/O

snp_readBed() snp_readBed2()

Read PLINK files into a "bigSNP"

snp_writeBed()

Write PLINK files from a "bigSNP"

Read BGEN files into a "bigSNP"

snp_attach()

Attach a "bigSNP" from backing files

snp_attachExtdata()

Attach a "bigSNP" for examples and tests
